overview: Seven sexed up frat boys and three eager initiates participate in a hazing ceremony they'll never forget. Blindfolded and on their knees, three new pledges get ready for a series of sexual challenges that will leave them soaked, satisfied and eager to keep their frat brothers satisfied and served. Humiliation, bondage, sucking, rimming, fucking and gang-banging are all part of this amazing hazing ceremony.
tagline: Thank you, sir, may I suck another?
title: Hazed
